topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5405310063687256ff3e0000#post_5405310063687256ff3e0000
Yeah, but still. The possibilities are almost endless. Who wouldn't want to see Beethoven, Tupac and Elvis have a three way Keyblade duel? Yes, I can imagine Batman and Alucard taking on Organization XIII, I can imagine Pit and Sora working together to take down Megatron, I can imagine Riku fighting Raiden, I can even imagine Darksied and Ansem planning to backstab each other.
topics.author: 513e68eda4c72d4e3b000164
